title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Procedure 111 - Administrative Adjudication Policy and Plan; Procedural Requirements (Repealed)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Procedure 111 - Administrative Adjudication Policy and Plan; Procedural Requirements (Repealed)

State Regulations
§ 111.1 - Explanation; note; definitions (Repealed), version 2
§ 111.2 - Banking department policy respecting hearing officers; hearing officers' conduct (Repealed), version 2
§ 111.3 - Notice; answer (Repealed), version 2
§ 111.4 - Representation (Repealed), version 2
§ 111.5 - Subpoenas; discovery (Repealed), version 2
§ 111.6 - Postponements and adjournments (Repealed), version 2
§ 111.7 - Failure to appear (Repealed), version 2
§ 111.8 - Application to reopen (Repealed), version 2

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Procedure 111

Statutory authority: State Administrative Procedure Act, §
301.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
